nodes.name: Below Etank Junction
nodes.note: Just below the Energy tank. Reachable to kill the Sova without Morph.

nodes.name: Top Left Door
nodes.note: Samus is considered to spawn at 5 because of the crumble blocks

to.note: FIXME Mockballing from the next room can also be done with smaller runways (like in the vanilla strat). See issue #63.

enemies.name: Tripper
enemies.note: Drops can be reached from land without issues

to.note: This is considered one-way even though technically you can get from 2 to 5 without falling to 5 with a tight jump using Spring Ball. This won't be expected for heat run times
All strats use similar time. It's possible to cleanly hit the morph passage with a midair mockball, or to morph late and get pushed into the passage by taking damage on the Boyon

obstacles.name: Right-side Speed Blocks
obstacles.note: The speed blocks on the right side of the speedway. Breaking those is needed for some canLeaveCharged strats.
